text: Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: Beyond that, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
ถ้าเธอเก็บไว้ยิ่งกว่านั้น เป็นนิสสัคคิยปาจิตตีย์
If he should put it aside for longer than that, it entails expiation with forfeiture.
